about.text: Jonas Kunz, a.k.a. Jouns, is an up-and-coming director and director of photography (DP) based in Bern. He picked up his first camera at an early age to film and photograph everything that caught his eye. In 2020, Jonas founded the 'Ocular Collective' (ocular.ch) together with the like-minded Andrin Schranz and Cedric Ribi. Since then, Jonas has already produced numerous music videos, documentaries, and other types of short films.
